text:
Insider inc. | Director of Engineering - Engagement

Interested in joining a growing digital media company? Know how to get the best out of engineers while helping them learn and grow? Passionate about user experience and engaging users?

We are looking for an inspiring, talented Engineering Manager to head up our Engagement & Mobile team at Business Insider. If you are interested, check out the listing below...

https://careers.jobscore.com/careers/businessinsider/jobs/di...
